products.body_html:
Refresh your wardrobe with the Fitted Puff Sleeves Black Midi Dress! It's stylish, simple, and super elegant. The bold puff sleeves and the pretty sweetheart neckline give it just the right mix of modern style and a romantic touch.

Made from premium structured fabric, it feels soft and comfy on the skin. The fitted design flatters your shape, while the flared hem adds a graceful touch. Perfect for everything – from festive outings to dinner plans, it’s one of those dresses you can wear again and again without a second thought.

About The Product

Country of Origin 

 Proudly Made in India

Brand

 Littlebox India (LBI)

Pack Contains

 1 piece

 

  • Neck Type : Sweetheart
  • Material : Polyester 60% ,Viscose 20%, Twill 20%
  • Pattern Type : Solid
  • Fit Type : Regular
  • Sleeve Style : Puff Sleeve
  • Colour : Black
  • Length : Midi
  • Lining : N/A
  • Stitch : Ready to Wear
  • Care Instructions : Hand Wash or Machine Wash

Why this product?

  • Comfortable fabric
  • Suitable for any occasion
  • Chic look

How to style?

Casual Look : Pair your black midi dress with white sneakers and a denim jacket for an easy going, stylish day-out vibe.

Party Look : Pair it with block heels, traditional gold earrings, and a stylish sling bag for an elegant evening-ready look.

We are introducing the Retro Casual High Waist Solid Long Ankle Pleated Skirt In Blue, a soft and comfy pick for brunch, chill weekends, or college days. This high waist blue skirt (in a dreamy blue tone) has a long flowy look with gentle pleats and tiered ruffle layers. Made from lightweight polyester, it’s breezy, easy to wear, and gives you that effortless style. If you're into relaxed fashion that still looks cute, this high waist blue skirt is a perfect choice.
